project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password with user-defined length, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Allow user input for password length
Include functionality to ensure the password contains uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
Write tests for the password generation function to ensure it meets all requirements (length, character types)
Execute tests on the password generation function to ensure that it functions correctly
